name: Greenbelt Rampager
text: When Greenbelt Rampager enters the battlefield, pay {E}{E} (two energy counters). If you can't, return Greenbelt Rampager to its owner's hand and you get {E}.

editions.flavor: Subtlety is not a necessary part of sabotage.

name: Greener Pastures
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls more lands than each other player, the player creates a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

name: Greenhilt Trainee
text: {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Greenhilt Trainee's power is 4 or greater.

editions.flavor: "Our ancestors adapted to this world of metal. Just as they did, we will adapt to this world of evil."

name: Green Mana Battery
text:
{2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Green Mana Battery.
{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Green Mana Battery: Add {G} to your mana pool, then add an additional {G} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Green Scarab
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by green creatures.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a green permanent.

name: Greenseeker
text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: "A rumor passes among the snakes, whispered by the rushes, inspiring the seekers: the goddess Freyalise is alive in Skyshroud."

name: Greenside Watcher
text: {T}: Untap target Gate.

editions.flavor: "The Izzet may incite war, but my duty is here. I will not abandon the wild."

name: Green Sun's Zenith
text: Search your library for a green creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

editions.flavor: As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.
As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.
As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.

name: Green Ward
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from green. This effect doesn't remove Green Ward.

name: Greenwarden of Murasa
text:
When Greenwarden of Murasa enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
When Greenwarden of Murasa dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Greenweaver Druid
text: {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: The other tribes call them fanatics, but none deny that the Mul Daya elves have an iron-strong bond to some force greater than themselves.
The other tribes call them fanatics, but none deny that the Mul Daya elves have an iron-strong bond to some force greater than themselves.

name: Greenwheel Liberator
text: Revolt — Greenwheel Liberator enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

editions.flavor: "I will not rest until every vestige of the Consulate—every banner, flag, and standard—has fallen."

name: Gremlin Infestation
text:
Enchant artifact
At the beginning of your end step, Gremlin Infestation deals 2 damage to enchanted artifact's controller.
When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, create a 2/2 red Gremlin creature token.

name: Gremlin Mine
text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Gremlin Mine: Gremlin Mine deals 4 damage to target artifact creature.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Gremlin Mine: Remove up to four charge counters from target noncreature artifact.

name: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden
text:
Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

name: Grenzo, Havoc Raiser
text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, choose one —
• Goad target creature that player controls. 
• Exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

editions.flavor: "You burn. I'll pillage."

name: Grenzo's Cutthroat
text:
First strike
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

editions.flavor: "Their guards are soft, ready to welcome a sharp dagger."

name: Grenzo's Rebuttal
text: Create a 4/4 red Ogre creature token. Starting with you, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, and a land from among the permanents controlled by the player to his or her left. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.

name: Grenzo's Ruffians
text:
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)
Whenever Grenzo's Ruffians deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent.

name: Greven il-Vec
text: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature. It can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor: As a ruthless leader for Volrath, Greven il-Vec serves his lord by commanding the flying ship Predator. Greven has attained his powerful rank through a series of underhanded schemes and assassinations, the majority of which were blessed by Volrath himself.

name: Gridlock
text: Tap X target nonland permanents.

editions.flavor:
"One tiny peg pulled from a single wagon wheel, and an entire district grinds to a halt."
—Lazav

name: Grid Monitor
text: You can't cast creature spells.

editions.flavor: The vedalken protect the Knowledge Pool at any cost.

name: Grief Tyrant
text:
Grief Tyrant enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it.
When Grief Tyrant dies, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature for each -1/-1 counter on Grief Tyrant.

name: Griffin Canyon
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Untap target Griffin. If it's a creature, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"Where are falling feathers deadlier than falling rock?"
—The One Thousand Questions

name: Griffin Dreamfinder
text:
Flying
When Griffin Dreamfinder enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: Some griffins are able to pluck mystic auras from the Æther that are hidden from other mortals.

name: Griffin Guide
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
When enchanted creature dies, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

name: Griffin Protector
text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.

name: Griffin Rider
text: As long as you control a Griffin creature, Griffin Rider gets +3/+3 and has flying.

editions.flavor: After fighting alongside the griffin riders, older knights of Thune learned to admire a mount that could rip an enemy to shreds in seconds.

name: Griffin Sentinel
text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

editions.flavor: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.
Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

name: Grifter's Blade
text:
Flash
As Grifter's Blade enters the battlefield, choose a creature you control it could be attached to. If you do, it enters the battlefield attached to that creature.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

name: Grim Affliction
text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

editions.flavor: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.
Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.

name: Grim Backwoods
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{2}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"I love what they've done with the place."
—Liliana Vess

name: Grimclaw Bats
text:
Flying
{B}, Pay 1 life: Grimclaw Bats gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Even on a world of metal, there are those who thirst for blood.

name: Grim Contest
text: Choose target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its toughness to the other.

editions.flavor: The invader hoped he could survive the beast's jaws and emerge through its rotting skin.

name: Grim Discovery
text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis
editions.flavor: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.
Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.

name: Grim Feast
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Grim Feast deals 1 damage to you.
Whenever a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you gain life equal to its toughness.

editions.flavor: "Hmmm—midnight snack."

name: Grim Flayer
text:
Trample
Whenever Grim Flayer deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.
Delirium — Grim Flayer gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

name: Grim Flowering
text: Draw a card for each creature card in your graveyard.

editions.flavor:
"Nothing in nature goes to waste, not even the rotting corpse of a good-for-nothing, blood-sucking vampire."
—Halana of Ulvenwald

name: Grimgrin, Corpse-Born
text:

Sacrifice another creature: Untap Grimgrin and put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever Grimgrin attacks, destroy target creature defending player controls, then put a +1/+1 counter on Grimgrin.

name: Grim Guardian
text: Constellation — Whenever Grim Guardian or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

editions.flavor: Occasionally the living wander to the Rivers, but the wardens of Athreos ensure that only the dead pass.

name: Grim Haruspex
text:
Morph {B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, draw a card.

editions.flavor: "We all want to know what's going on in someone else's head. I simply open it up and look."
"Your enemies may be cowardly, my lord, but one should never call them gutless."

name: Grim Harvest
text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Recover {2}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

name: Grim Lavamancer
text: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

editions.set: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning

text:

{4}: Untap Grim Monolith.

editions.flavor: Part prison, part home.

text:
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a study counter on Grimoire of the Dead.
{T}, Remove three study counters from Grimoire of the Dead and sacrifice it: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types.

name: Grimoire Thief
text:
Whenever Grimoire Thief becomes tapped, exile the top three cards of target opponent's library face down.
You may look at cards exiled with Grimoire Thief.
{U}, Sacrifice Grimoire Thief: Turn all cards exiled with Grimoire Thief face up. Counter all spells with those names.

name: Grim Poppet
text:
Grim Poppet enters the battlefield with three -1/-1 counters on it.
Remove a -1/-1 counter from Grim Poppet: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.

editions.flavor: Beware a scarecrow bearing gifts—especially sloshing vessels of acid.

name: Grim Reminder
text:
Search your library for a nonland card and reveal it. Each opponent who cast a card this turn with the same name as that card loses 6 life. Then shuffle your library.
{B}{B}: Return Grim Reminder from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Grim Return
text: Choose target creature card in a graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

editions.flavor: The necromancer's touch strips away memory and loyalty, and only strength and malice remain.

name: Grim Roustabout
text:
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grim Roustabout.

editions.flavor: He'll point you to your death row seats.

name: Grim Tutor
text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. You lose 3 life.

editions.flavor:
One who goes unpunished never learns.
—Greek proverb

He who goes unpunished never learns.
—Greek proverb

name: Grindclock
text:
{T}: Put a charge counter on Grindclock.
{T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of charge counters on Grindclock.

editions.flavor: Pray you never hear it chime.
Pray you never hear it chime.

name: Grinding Station
text:
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, you may untap Grinding Station.

name: Grindstone
text: {3}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If both cards share a color, repeat this process.

editions.flavor:
"Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone."
—Crovax

"Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone."
—Crovax

"All attempts to halt the machine failed. We must find a way to repurpose it."
—Consulate engineer's log

name: Grinning Demon
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
Morph {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: It's drawn to the scent of screaming.

name: Grinning Demon Avatar
text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent discards a card.

editions.flavor: It's drawn to the scent of screaming.
It's drawn to the scent of screaming.

name: Grinning Ignus
text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

editions.flavor:
"Take care what you offer the ignus. Food, perhaps. Coins. But nothing flammable!"
—Stovic, village eccentric

—Stovic, village eccentric

name: Grinning Totem
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.

name: Grip of Amnesia
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller exiles all cards from his or her graveyard.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"Would you abandon your past to save your future?"
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Grip of Chaos
text: Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, if it has a single target, reselect its target at random. (Select from among all legal targets.)

editions.flavor: When the world is consumed by chaos, the skilled and the foolish are on equal footing.

name: Grip of Desolation
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target creature and target land.

editions.flavor: As the hand closed, there was first terror, then numbness, and finally nothingness.

name: Grip of Phyresis
text: Gain control of target Equipment, then create a 0/0 black Germ creature token and attach that Equipment to it.

editions.flavor:
"Even your blade knows who will triumph here."
—Atraxa, Praetors' Voice

name: Grip of the Roil
text:
Surge {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.

name: Griptide
text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

editions.flavor:
"Beware the seagrafs just off the shore. These waters are filled with hungry geists looking for an easy meal."
—Captain Eberhart

"Beware the seagrafs just off the shore. These waters are filled with hungry geists looking for an easy meal."
—Captain Eberhart
When the sea god Thassa wishes to speak with a mortal, she does not issue a summons or grant a vision requesting a visit. The sea simply brings her guest before her.

name: Griselbrand
text:
Flying, lifelink

"Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

"Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Grisly Anglerfish
text: {6}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

editions.flavor: ". . . it's that the lure of the sea is impossible to ignore."

name: Grisly Salvage
text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

editions.flavor: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.
To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.
To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

name: Grisly Spectacle
text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

editions.flavor:
"Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

"Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Grisly Transformation
text:
Enchant creature
When Grisly Transformation enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has intimidate. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

name: Gristleback
text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Sacrifice Gristleback: You gain life equal to Gristleback's power.

editions.flavor: Loyal in battle, hearty in stew.

name: Gristle Grinner
text: Whenever a creature dies, Gristle Grinner gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"There it was, clawing the ice as it chittered and clicked its teeth. We fled in horror before it unearthed its grisly meal."
—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

name: Grixis
text:
Blue, black, and/or red creature cards in your graveyard have unearth. The unearth cost is equal to the card's mana cost. (Pay the card's mana cost: Return it to the battlefield. The creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Grixis Battlemage
text:
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.

editions.flavor: Vitals of Grixis who eschew undeath must scrape and scratch to retain their mortality. The result is a breed of inventive mages.

name: Grixis Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Grixis Grimblade gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)

name: Grixis Illusionist
text: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

text:

text:

name: Grizzled Angler
text: {T}: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. Then if there is a colorless creature card in your graveyard, transform Grizzled Angler.

editions.flavor: "There's no question that these waters are treacherous, but if there's one thing I've learned in all my years of sailing . . ."

—Aarsil the Blessed

name: Grizzled Outcasts
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Grizzled Outcasts.

editions.flavor: Seen as unsavory, the hunters were never allowed in town—until one night they vanished.

text:

name: Groffskithur
text: Whenever Groffskithur becomes blocked, you may return target card named Groffskithur from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: It growls not to threaten, but to summon.

name: Grollub
text: Whenever Grollub is dealt damage, each opponent gains that much life.

editions.flavor: Mogglings caught in a misdeed often blame the grollub. Even though the creature is usually innocent, no taskmaster can resist an excuse to beat it.

name: Grotag Siege-Runner
text: {R}, Sacrifice Grotag Siege-Runner: Destroy target creature with defender. Grotag Siege-Runner deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

editions.flavor:
"I don't think he's bringing in the mail . . . ."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

name: Grotag Thrasher
text: Whenever Grotag Thrasher attacks, target creature can't block this turn.

editions.flavor: The goblin fancied himself a rider. The lizard was happy with its new flail.

name: Grotesque Hybrid
text:
Whenever Grotesque Hybrid deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Discard a card: Grotesque Hybrid gains flying and protection from green and from white until end of turn.

name: Grotesque Mutation
text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Ground Assault
text: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

editions.flavor:
"Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."
—Narbulg Nine Fingers

name: Groundbreaker
text:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Groundbreaker.

editions.flavor: The earth's memory is long, its retribution brief.

name: Grounded
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses flying.

editions.flavor:
"We've tracked Ludevic's monster across four provinces. When it lands, make sure it stays put."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig,
to Halana of Ulvenwald

name: Groundling Pouncer
text: {G/U}: Groundling Pouncer gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn and only if an opponent controls a creature with flying.

editions.flavor: Endry was determined to teach his groundlings a few winged-faerie tricks.

name: Ground Rift
text:
Target creature without flying can't block this turn.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

editions.flavor: Some time rifts didn't take away the people but just the ground they stood on.

name: Ground Seal
text:
When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.

editions.flavor:
"Let all we have buried be buried forever."
—Seton, centaur druid

"Let all we have buried be buried forever."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Groundshaker Sliver
text: Sliver creatures you control have trample. (If a Sliver you control would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

name: Groundskeeper
text: {1}{G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: "Soldiers speak of defending the soil, but they care only for their nations. I care nothing for their nations and everything for the soil."
Whereas the rebels fight to defend the land, they work to renew it.
"While the church thinks in terms of legacies, others think in terms of eternities."

name: Groundswell
text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

editions.flavor: "This world will not be tamed."
"This world will not be tamed."
